description: Descubre los mejores hoteles en Fukuoka, Japan. Encuentra ofertas exclusivas y alojamientos de lujo.

hotels.title: Fukuoka Central City Retreat near Entertainment District
hotels.description: ANA Crowne Plaza Fukuoka, an IHG Hotel, is an urban escape located in the heart of the bustling harbour city of Fukuoka. Dine on traditional cuisine at Chikushino restaurant, savour a cocktail at the Mezzanine Bar or nab a tasty treat from Trois patisserie. When Fukuoka tempts you to explore, indulge in a shopping spree at Canal City shopping mall or venture out to the neon-lit Nakasu entertainment district to experience steaming street foods and lively izakayas.

seo.title: Hoteles en Fukuoka - Japan Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Encuentra los mejores hoteles en Fukuoka, Japan con ofertas exclusivas. Reserva tu escapada perfecta con hasta 60% de descuento.
